  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Valovanja v različnih  snoveh</string>
            <string language="en">Waves in different mediums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegt in unterschiedliche Media wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondule dans différents medias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acena em media diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fluttua nei media differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα στα διαφορετικά μέσα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agita en diversos media</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sprememba amplitude valovanja pri prehodu iz ene v drugo snov in odbiti val.</string>
            <string language="en">Change in amplitude of waves when passing from one medium to another and resulting reflected waves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odbojni val</string>
            <string language="en">wave reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">interferenca</string>
            <string language="en">interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern Sie im Umfang Wellen beim Überschreiten 
von einem Medium zu anderen und zu resultierenden reflektierten 
Wellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changez dans l'amplitude de vagues en passant d'un 
support à l'autre et les vagues reflétées résultantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mude na amplitude das ondas ao passar de um media a
outro e às ondas refletidas resultantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambi nell'ampiezza delle onde quando passano da un
media un altro ed alle onde riflesse risultanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τον αλλαγή στο εύρος των κυμάτων κατά διάβαση από 
ένα μέσο σε άλλο και τα προκύπτοντα απεικονισμένα κύματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambie en la amplitud de ondas al pasar a partir de
un media a otro y a las ondas reflejadas que resultan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion de vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interférence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão da onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interferência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione dell'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interferenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση κυμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέμβαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión de la onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interferencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
